tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE greenhouse_gas_emissions (
  organization_id INT,
  emission_type VARCHAR(50),
  emission_value DECIMAL(10,2),
  reporting_year INT,
  PRIMARY KEY (organization_id, emission_type, reporting_year)
)

CREATE TABLE emissions (
    id INT NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY,
    org_id INT NOT NULL,
    emission_type VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    value FLOAT NOT NULL,
    date DATE NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (org_id) REFERENCES organizations(id)
);

CREATE TABLE carbon_footprint (
    id INT NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY,
    org_id INT NOT NULL,
    footprint_type VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    value FLOAT NOT NULL,
    date DATE NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (org_id) REFERENCES organizations(id)
);

CREATE TABLE Emissions (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    organization_id INT,
    year INT,
    emission_type VARCHAR,
    amount DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE CarbonFootprint (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    organization_id INT,
    year INT,
    total_footprint DECIMAL,
    offset_footprint DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE Reports (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    organization_id INT,
    year INT,
    report_type VARCHAR,
    report_url VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE Calculations (
    calc_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    org_id INT REFERENCES Organizations(org_id),
    emission_source_id INT REFERENCES EmissionSources(source_id),
    calc_date DATE,
    calc_result DECIMAL(10,2)
);
